GMT.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: (Greenwich Mean Time) the time as measured at Greenwich in London, that is used as an international standard for measuring time
GMT.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: Greenwich Mean Time; the time as measured at Greenwich in London, used as an international standard for measuring time
GMT.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The accident happened at 9.33 a.m. GMT on 14 May.
